title: What Can We Do To End Anti-Gay Bullying in Schools? Episode 148
description: What can we do to end bullying against gays?  There is a shocking increase in the number of young homosexuals who are commit suicide.  Many anti-bullying programs don't work and in this episode I talk to Dr. Elizabeth J. Meyer of Concordia University about what can be done.  No one should be bullied and we all need to care about those who are bullied to the point of considering suicide.  Find out more in this episode.
